inclusion.criterion: Willing to sign informed consent prior to initiation of any study mandated procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female ≥ 40 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of moderate to severe COPD, with an obstructive pattern on pulmonary function tests showing both: FEV1/FVC < 0.7 and FEV1 ≤ 60% of predicted value, on standard COPD therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Current or past smokers of ≥ 10 pack years
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients fulfilling one or more of the following criteria of documented COPD exacerbation within 1 months prior to screening:
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient sildenafil trial without hypotension.
